agent_purpose: Validates logical consistency and flags implausible conclusions
description: Agent that validates reasoning and checks for logical consistency

validation_checks.aspect_validated: Temporal ordering of cause and effect
validation_checks.explanation: The cause is stated to occur before the effect, which is logically consistent with causal reasoning.
The scenario described follows rules that apply in the real world and doesn't require unrealistic assumptions.

recommendations: Ensure causes are always described as occurring before effects.
Make sure assumptions are grounded in practical reality.
